# Shield of Fortification, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[3rd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 3]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 192

This spell functions as *[[Shield of Fortification (Spell)|shield of fortification]]*, except there is a 50% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and damage is instead be rolled normally, rather than 25%.
